entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic snippets: `interface` snippet prefix and more #65151
  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet inserts unexpected blank line when between statements #65150
  • C# compiler: severe performance issues with sister project #65142
  • Goldbar with KeyNotFoundException in CompilationTracker.FinalizeCompilationAsync #65138
  • GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig reference can exceed maximum string length #65134

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common package 4.3.1 references invalid 4.3.0 assembly version for netstandard2.0 #64926
  • Fix all without preview dialog #51310
    Backlog
  • CreateHostClientAsync takes 10-15 seconds to complete #51198
  • C# project's GoToDefinition sets target framework incorrectly #51031
    Backlog
  • IDE Code Style Analyzer to remove empty lines #50471
    Backlog
  • Ctrl+Q search results are duplicated #50437
    Backlog
  • Support syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and compile errors in code that is commented out using #if #50341
    Backlog
  • Popup font size for collapsed JavaScript is much smaller than for collapsed CSS & HTML #49667
    Backlog
  • Intellicode Global Find/Replace #49665
  • Generate override ToString() method to concatenate fields together #49578
    Backlog
  • Productivity feature: Add logger to class #49572
    Backlog
  • CodeAnalysis method NotSupportedException #49407
    Backlog
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Backlog
  • Reset settings Visual Studio #48863
    Backlog
  • Convert 'if' to 'switch' code fix suggested for comparisons with implicit casts #48832
    Backlog
  • Lock contention in ProjectCacheService.CacheObjectIfCachingEnabledForKey causes high CPU usage and slow Find All References #48488
    Backlog
  • Add a reference to System.Linq automatically when LINQ is used #48025
    Backlog
  • Infrastructure: Extract tests that don't require editor to Workspaces and Features layer tests #7039
    Backlog
  • [C# 9.0] Remove unnecessary cast doesn't know about target typing ? and ?? #47620
    Backlog
  • Add an error or warning for empty top level statements in c# 9 #47599
  • StackOverflowException on self reference #47435
  • Find All References does not find implicitly typed usage #47393
    Backlog
  • OOP doesn't synchronize non-C#/VB projects/documents. #47341
    Backlog
  • Call for cooperation between VS C# components #47036
    Backlog
  • Constant errors regarding "Diagnostic Analyzer runner" crashing #65064
  • Making "readonly" keyword available also in functions not only Constructor #46951
  • Add Codespaces support to Inline Parameter Name Hints #46792
  • Add text search in Go To with it's own keyboard shortcut #46640
  • Add `To` and `Fro` connectors from Object browser to Decompiled sources. #46560
    Backlog
  • More completions for generics arguments #46503
    Backlog
  • SyntaxNode.WithAdditionalAnnotations should throw if node is unsupported #46481
    Backlog
  • IDE error when accidentally combining a For-Loop with an Enumeration and a minus sign #46350
    Backlog
  • ViewModel violates DRY; here is the fix! #46274
    Backlog
  • Use MEF v2 for request handlers so we can use content type #46195
    Backlog
  • Object Browser question #45992
    Backlog
  • Convert /*??*/ comments to ?? operator #43390
    Backlog
  • Expose SyntaxFactory.AreEquivalent from SyntaxTree #45196
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb Code Fix for Missing using not working properly since update to 16.6.2 #45108
    Backlog
  • Tighten completion for `with` initializer #45014
    Backlog
  • Adding parameter should select it and scroll it into view in the datagrid (but not necessarily focus it) #44996
    Backlog
  • Add WithChanges to Solution, Project, Document. #44747
    Backlog
  • Fix All Preview should break down by projects and files, not just files #44740
    Backlog
  • VS should offer to simplify null conditional calls #44554
    Backlog
  • Codespaces nav-to doesn't show progress #44352
    Backlog
  • Suggest using declaration when the only statement outside the using statement has no interactions #42194
    Backlog
  • [question] How do I let users configure an analyzer? #43874
    Backlog
  • CSharpSpellCheckCodeFixProvider encoutered and error and has been disabled #44299
    Backlog
  • Pasting text with quotes into a verbatim string literal should double the quotes #44203
    Backlog
  • Add Classification API which mirrors the proposed LSP Semantic Tokens API #44155
    Backlog
  • wrong number of references #44138
    Backlog
  • Rename/refactor of using alias directive is not applied to references in file, but wait, there's more... #44135
    Backlog
  • Source generators: feedback on SyntaxFactory #43979
  • Optimization proposal: Specify capacity for collection initialization for well-known types #43944
  • Unable to find roslyn workspace in Source Generators #43905
  • No keyboard mnemonics on "Preview Changes" dialog's buttons #43778
  • Visual Basic iif statement delay evaluation of iif results until necessary #43417
  • VS 2019 16.5.3 - database project type - code fix provider error #43310
    Backlog
  • Visual studio keeps crashing when attempting to complete line of code #43221
    Backlog
  • [Refactoring] Extract class #22053
    Backlog
  • "Extract Method + Local" causes integration test failures #34070
  • Make individual portions of 'Rename' public. #43055
    Backlog
  • Need to ensure cast-simplification works properly with intptr/nint #42888
    Backlog
  • Add more search options in VS.NET #42728
    Backlog
  • Consider using IParameters instead of Parameter wrapper classes. #42687
    Backlog
  • go-to decompiled source should have an option allowing user to opt-out without being prompted again #42638
    Backlog
  • Missing suggestion for generic types on unimported types, like `Collection<>` #42561
    Backlog
  • Symbol completion and target-typed new #42556
    Backlog
  • Expose Rolsyn IDE features through LSP #42427
    Backlog
  • 'Convert to interpolated string' should not nest an existing interpolated string #42195
    Backlog
  • Remove UnitTestingIncrementalAnalyzer #42187
    Backlog
  • Need an IDE level API that matches arguments to parameters #42149
  • IntelliSense should take into account DescriptionAttribute if there is no XML documentation on a code element. #41876
    Backlog
  • Ask for "Derived types" from contextual menu #41875
    Backlog
  • Turn on navigate to decompiled sources instead of it being behind a feature flag #41766
    Backlog
  • Bringing up CodeActions *in* Roslyn.sln takes a very long time now. #41667
    Backlog
  • Prevent Drop VB line Continuation #41663
    Backlog
  • Go to Base should not include Object #41614
    Backlog
  • Roslyn ServiceHub OOM #40763
    Backlog
  • Add a public member of CompletionContext that allows callers to get a snapshot of the completion items for testing purposes #41311
    Backlog
  • Analyzer suggestion: Use lambda expression #52772
  • In Visual Studio/.editorconfig for C#, add new predefined type preferences "For objects" #56504
  • TaskCanceledException in TodoCommentIncrementalAnalyzer.GetTodoItems #41158
    Backlog
  • Add Parameter - Handle multiple TODOs #41050
    Backlog
  • Simplifying object instantiating where expected type is known #41014
  • FAR (Find All References) UI Updates #40963
    Backlog
  • FAR (Find All References) to have more group by options #40962
    Backlog
  • Strange yellow-bad notification about TFMs and nuget TMs. #40899
    Backlog
  • Go To Derived Types #40847
    Backlog
  • Add Item does not support Enum type #40798
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Suggestion: Predictive Errors #40621
    Backlog
  • Indicate direct inheritors in Go To Implementation #40609
    Backlog
  • code clean up is not working on all instances #40480
    Backlog
  • Tests not running on latest VS #40267
    Backlog
  • Invalid "IDE0062 Local function can be made static" when local function calls a local function that captures a struct parameter #40259
    Backlog
  • Guard all LSP entry points against crashing #40177
    Backlog
  • Should the Rename API (and the IDE layers in general) be less aggressive about crashing when something goes wrong? #40176
    Backlog
  • Slow completion in CodeGenerationPointerTypeSymbol.cs #40120
    Backlog
  • OOP: KeyNotFoundException from RequestAsset #40073
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix implement-interface with parameterized properties #65154
    Area-IDE
  • Allow [UnscopedRef] annotation for ref and in parameters #65153
    Area-Compilers
  • Show explicit error message when extracting interface from module #65152
    Area-IDE
  • Improve decl name suggestions for out-vars #65149
    Area-IDE
  • Account for possible failures during attribute retargeting. #65143
    Area-Compilers
  • Add langversion checks for lambda optional and `params` parameters #65140
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure the lookup return the CompletionProvider if exist #65133
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix a race between AsyncQueue operations #65078
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cleanup ?? usage #65147
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve 'use simple using statement' for a few cases. #65145
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix null ref in declaration name computation #65146
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65079
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move test method to test code #64005
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65073
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix implement-interface collisions with ref-returning indexers #65132
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Better name suggestions when creating new out-variables #65129
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Display lambda default parameter values in QuickInfo #65045
    Area-IDE
  • Consistently extract synthesized delegate info from method symbol #64966
    Area-Compilers
  • Add test showing issues do not repro #65135
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer 'introduce variable' on 'this' expression #65128
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65157
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65156
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65155
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers
  • Move net60 ref assemblies to compiler only #65125
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce amount of allocated MissingMetadataTypeSymbol symbols during various lookup operations. #65046
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add ExternalAccess name recommender API for Pythia #65075
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - Adds tooltip descriptions to snippets #65131
    Area-IDE
  • Improve parser error recovery around misplaced semicolon #65089
    Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Reuse `LambdaSymbol` when inferring delegate type #65003
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Add back designer attribute scanning #65118
    Area-IDE
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Harden FileLogger against all kind of exceptions during File IO #65117
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the static ConditionalWeakTable for per-project CompilationWit… #65116
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
